title: 'IKEA Cork trivets 7 inches'
body: 'We are using everyday for putting hot utensils on dining table and also putting it under pestle while we are crushing ginger for our morning tea to protect our granite kitchen top'

title: 'Sturdy durable and great value for money'
body: It's an IKEA product at a great price.

title: 'Serves the purpose if you look beyond durability'
body: 'This trivet is light weight and does not seem so durable. Need to use it for months to see if it is a good purchase. Saying that it does serve its intended purpose. Saves the wooden table from hot utensils. Or avoids expensive utensils from scratches while setting on hard surfaces. It does take stains from a hot utensil. For Rs.600 (6 pieces 2 sets 3 in a set) not too bad a deal.'

title: 'Highly disappointed'
body: The doubt if it's the original IKEA product that i have received. The trivet lacks its quality .One of trivets edge was broken. I would not recommend to anyone if you are looking for a better sturdy trivet.

title: 'IKEA- reliable as always'
body: 'The perfect setup for your glass table. I have been using these fr IKEA eversince I knew IKEA about 14 years ago. Nothing has changed. As sturdy as super value for money and keeps my table scratch free. Go for it.'

title: 'A bit disappointed'

title: 'Value for money'
body: The product is really worth a buy. I use it daily and it is of good quality material. The Amazon / Seller delivered the product on time. Definitely value for money. Don't think too much to buy or not IKEA has created a long lasting product.

title: 'Broken mats arrived!'
body: 'I have used these mats that‚Äôs I brought from Ikea Dubai before used them for over 15 years with no problems! Wanted fresh ones so ordered this. Unfortunately the quality is really bad which is very unlikely for Ikea. The mat arrived broken. A mat set that hasn‚Äôt broken or needed replacement for over 15years just arrived broken! Horribly disappointed!'

title: 'Nice trivets'
body: 'Very nice trivets but i feel it will not be easy to clean if we spill something on it. but eco friendly products are good and i like them. Lets see how long they last.'

title: 'Good product'
body: 'Nice trivets great for the dining table. Performs its function of protecting the table from hot serving vessels quite well looks classy and blends in well with most decor. Looks a lot better than the tacky silicone trivets though probably not as washable/moisture-resistant.  Not sure about long-term durability but would recommend.'

title: 'Superb'
body: 'Superb. I have bought these same trivets from IKEA - USA and they lasted me for over 15 years. Highly recommend it.'

title: 'Nice cork pads for dining table'
body: 'We were in U.S about ten years ago.There we visited IKEA showroom got for our home this cork pads.We r happy that the same item from IKEA with the same quality is available to us from IKEA Hyderabadthro amazon.Though some of the pads have withered we want to replace them here in India.The quality is nice and keep it up amazon and ikea!'

title: 'Not that strong quality'

Need to wait and see whether it serves the purpose.'
